title: Fedele Bench
description:
The Fedele dining collection is a must-have for every home. This collection is for anyone that wants to add some by traditional charm into their home. The dining table showcases two storage drawers that are perfect for keeping dining necessities on hand. The weathered oak and cream finish adds charm to any space. The side chairs offer classic design aesthetics with its slatted backrest and padded seat; the bench is beautifully crafted to match the table finish. Set the scene for dinner parties, family game nights with this Fedele dining group.

title: Mant Stool (2Pc)
description:
If you are looking for a functional piece for gathering, this is the counter height set that has it all. The Mant counter height set features a wall storage case with upper rack for all of your stemware and wine bottles, and a lower cabinet for the private reserves. Have a seat at the stools, which featuring a stylish "bottle cap" seat and metal base with footrest; and entertain at the table top with half round end to tie in with the single leg base. This will be a great additional to any small dining or entertaining area in your home.
